meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>big</kanji> <kanji>resist</kanji> is something he <vocabulary>generally</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>usually</vocabulary> does... at least <vocabulary>in most cases</vocabulary>. He's usually a big resistor, that one.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
